00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00031 BOOST_XINT_INLINE void square(data_t& target, const data_t n) {
00032     target.set(0);
00033     target.beginmod(n.length * 2 + 1, true);
00034 
00035     const digit_t *ndigits = n.digits();
00036     size_t nlen = n.length;
00037 
00038     digit_t *rdigits = target.digits(), *rmax = rdigits + target.length;
00039 
00040     // Calculate the product of digits of unequal index
00041     size_t i = 0;
00042     doubledigit_t c;
00043     do {
00044         const doubledigit_t ii = ndigits[i];
00045         const digit_t *jp = ndigits + i + 1;
00046         digit_t *rp = rdigits + i + (i + 1), *rpe = rdigits + i + nlen;
00047         if (rpe > rmax) rpe = rmax;
00048 
00049         c = 0;
00050         while (rp < rpe) {
00051             doubledigit_t t = ii * *jp++ + *rp + c;
00052             *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00053             c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00054         }
00055         if (rp < rmax) *rp = static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00056     } while (++i < nlen - 1);
00057 
00058     // Multiplication of inner products by two
00059     c = 0;
00060     digit_t *rp = rdigits + 1, *rpe = rdigits + (2 * nlen) - 1;
00061     if (rpe > rmax) rpe = rmax;
00062 
00063     if (rp < rmax) {
00064         do {
00065             doubledigit_t t = (doubledigit_t(*rp) << 1) + c;
00066             *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00067             c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00068         } while (rp < rpe);
00069         if (rp < rmax) *rp = static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00070     }
00071 
00072     // Addition of inner squares
00073     const digit_t *ip = ndigits, *ipe = ndigits + nlen;
00074     rp = rdigits;
00075     c = 0;
00076     do {
00077         doubledigit_t t = doubledigit_t(*ip) * *ip + *rp + c;
00078         *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00079         if (rp >= rmax) break;
00080         c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00081 
00082         t = c + *rp;
00083         *rp++ = static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00084         if (rp >= rmax) break;
00085         c = (t >> bits_per_digit);
00086     } while (++ip < ipe);
00087     if (rp < rmax) *rp += static_cast<digit_t>(c);
00088 
00089     // No need to change length
00090     target.negative = false;
00091     target.endmod();
00092 }
00093 
00094 BOOST_XINT_INLINE void multiply(data_t& target, const data_t n, const data_t by)
00095 {
00096     if (n.is_zero() || by.is_zero()) { target.set(0); return; }
00097 
00098     if (n.same_storage(by)) {
00099         if (n.negative != by.negative) {
00100             square(target, n);
00101             target.negative = true;
00102             return;
00103         } else {
00104             square(target, n);
00105             return;
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109     target.length = 0;
00110     target.beginmod(n.length + by.length, true);
00111 
00112     digit_t *adigits = target.digits(), *ae = adigits + target.max_length();
00113     size_t maxdigit = target.max_length(), nlen = n.length, bylen = by.length;
00114 
00115     // Now multiply the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00116     const digit_t *d1 = n.digits(), *d1e = d1 + (std::min)(nlen, maxdigit);
00117     for (int digit1 = 0; d1 < d1e; ++digit1, ++d1) {
00118         const digit_t *d2 = by.digits(), *d2e = d2 + (std::min)(bylen, maxdigit
00119             - digit1);
00120         for (int digit2 = 0; d2 < d2e; ++digit2, ++d2) {
00121             // First multiply the two digits
00122             doubledigit_t t = doubledigit_t(*d1) * *d2;
00123 
00124             // Now add the result to the answer.
00125             int carry=0;
00126             digit_t *a = adigits + digit1 + digit2;
00127             doubledigit_t addt = doubledigit_t(*a) + (t & digit_mask);
00128             if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1;
00129             *a++=static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00130 
00131             if (a < ae) {
00132                 addt = *a + ((t >> bits_per_digit) & digit_mask) + carry;
00133                 if (addt >= digit_overflowbit) carry=1; else carry=0;
00134                 *a++ = static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00135 
00136                 while (carry && a < ae) {
00137                     addt = *a + 1;
00138                     *a++ = static_cast<digit_t>(addt);
00139                     if (addt < digit_overflowbit) break;
00140                 }
00141             }
00142         }
00143     }
00144 
00145     // No need to change length
00146     target.negative = (n.negative != by.negative);
00147     target.endmod();
00148 }
00149 
00150 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator*=(const data_t by) {
00151     multiply(*this, duplicate(), by);
00152     return *this;
00153 }
00154 
00155 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator*(const data_t n1, const data_t n2) {
00156     data_t r(n1.new_holder());
00157     multiply(r, n1, n2);
00158     return r;
00159 }
